Description: Discussion of how matter (gas, liquid, solid) is cycled within the earth's  systems in the context of human use of the earth's resources and contemporary  concerns about sustainability e.g. ozone layer, rare-earth elements,  hydrocarbon combustion, potable water, plastic recycling This course fulfills a  single unit in each of the following BU Hub areas: Scientific Inquiry I,  Ethical Reasoning, Critical Thinking.
